The video of the man shouting pro: Pakistan slogans in Tilak Nagar, Delhi went viral on social media platforms such as Twitter and Facebook.
Different users on social media: including a verified Twitter handle from Pakistan, shared the video with various narratives, some suggesting the man was being forced to raise anti-Pakistan slogans while others claimed he was mentally challenged.
Author and film: maker Vivek Agnihotri quoted-tweeted the video with a different narrative, highlighting citizenship issues in India.
A report by India Today confirmed that t: Pakistan slogans. The police did not register a case against him due to his mental condition.
